original_text: as he does in all his letters when he speaks in them of these matters. There are some things in them that are hard to understand, which the ignorant and unstable twist to their own destruction, as they do the other Scriptures.
korean_text: 또 그 모든 편지에도 이런 일에 관하여 말하였으되 그 중에 알기 어려운 것이 더러 있으니 무식한 자들과 굳세지 못한 자들이 다른 성경과 같이 그것도 억지로 풀다가 스스로 멸망에 이르느니라

sentences.original_text: as he does in all his letters
when he speaks in them of these matters.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 편지들에서 이런 일들에 대해 말할 때

sentences.original_text: There are some things in them
which the ignorant and unstable twist
as they do the other Scriptures.
